13:10:22</sys_updated_on><value> (function execute(inputs, outputs) {
// new Utils().tx_output(inputs.tx, inputs.stdout)
var tx = inputs.tx; var stdout = tx.output;
try { output = JSON.parse(stdout)
tx.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId tx.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash tx.transaction_fee = output.record.transactionFee
if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') { tx.status = 'completed' tx.hedera_status = output.receipt.status } else { throw Error("Hedera status is not success") }
} catch (e) { tx.out_parsing_log = e.toString() tx.hedera_status = output.error.status tx.status = 'failed' } finally { tx.update(); }
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value 11:20:02</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
tx = inputs.tx
from = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_account') from.get(tx.from)
to = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_account') to.get(tx.to)
token = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_token') token.get(tx.token)
var cmd = 'cd ' + gs.getProperty('x_snc_hspoke.hcli_home') + ' && node hcli token transfer'
var transfer if (tx.amount.toString() != "") { transfer = [{ from: from.account_id.toString(), to: to.account_id.toString(), token_id: token.token_id.toString(), amount: tx.amount.toString() }] }
if (tx.serial.toString() != "") { transfer = [{ from: from.account_id.toString(), to: to.account_id.toString(), token_id: token.token_id.toString(), serial: tx.serial.toString() }] }
cmd = cmd + ' --transfers ' + JSON.stringify(JSON.stringify(transfer)) //cmd = cmd + ' --transfers \'' + JSON.stringify(transfer) + '\'' //cmd = cmd + ' --transfers &apos;' + JSON.stringify(transfer) + '&apos;' //it works
if (tx.sign_with.toString() != "") { k = tx.sign_with.toString().split(',') for (i = 0; i < k.length; i++) { kk = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_key') kk.get(k[i]) cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + kk.public_key } }
outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value tx = inputs.tx
from = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_account') from.get(tx.from)
to = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_account') to.get(tx.to)
token = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_token') token.get(tx.token)
var cmd = 'cd ' + gs.getProperty('x_snc_hspoke.hcli_home') + ' && node hcli token transfer'
var transfer if (tx.amount.toString() != "") { transfer = [{ from: from.account_id.toString(), to: to.account_id.toString(), token_id: token.token_id.toString(), amount: tx.amount.toString() }] }
if (tx.serial.toString() != "") { transfer = [{ from: from.account_id.toString(), to: to.account_id.toString(), token_id: token.token_id.toString(), serial: tx.serial.toString() }] }
cmd = cmd + ' --transfers ' + JSON.stringify(JSON.stringify(transfer)) //cmd = cmd + ' --transfers \'' + JSON.stringify(transfer) + '\'' //cmd = cmd + ' --transfers &apos;' + JSON.stringify(transfer) + '&apos;' //it works
if (tx.sign_with.toString() != "") { k = tx.sign_with.toString().split(',') for (i = 0; i < k.length; i++) { kk = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_key') kk.get(k[i]) cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + kk.public_key } }
outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value
